pull.title: cmake: Set `WITH_ZMQ` to `ON` in Windows presets
pull.body: The "zeromq" feature is already enabled by default in `vcpkg.json`, and there appears to be no reason to omit this configuration option when building on Windows.

events.body: The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers. ### Code Coverage & Benchmarks For details see: https://corecheck.dev/bitcoin/bitcoin/pulls/33971. ### Reviews See [the guideline](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#code-review) for information on the review process. | Type | Reviewers | | ---- | --------- | | ACK | [maflcko](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/33971#issuecomment-3595102351) | If your review is incorrectly listed, please copy-paste <!--meta-tag:bot-skip--> into the comment that the bot should ignore.

committer Hennadii Stepanov <32963518+hebasto@users.noreply.github.com> 1764508549 +0000

cmake: Set `WITH_ZMQ` to `ON` in Windows presets

The "zeromq" feature is already enabled by default in `vcpkg.json`, and
there appears to be no reason to omit this configuration option when
building on Windows.

events.message:
cmake: Set `WITH_ZMQ` to `ON` in Windows presets

The "zeromq" feature is already enabled by default in `vcpkg.json`, and
there appears to be no reason to omit this configuration option when
building on Windows.
